name: @guscrawford.com/jyve-mongo
description: Out-of-the-box Generic Repository via mongoclient for NodeJS
author: Gus

scripts.postinstall: echo "âœ…  Replacing @guscrawford.com/jyve-core" && cd ../core && yarn rebuild && mkdir "../mongo/node_modules/@guscrawford.com" && mkdir "../mongo/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/jyve-core" &&  cp -r dist "../mongo/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/jyve-core" && cp package.json "../mongo/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/jyve-core/package.json"
